title: Own your Kandyan Dream Home.
details:
Green Valley Polgolla has 22 blocks of flat buildable (safe) land adjacent to 2 housing schemes. Plots between 10 to 15 perches with 20 ft wide paved road. Has electricity, water supply and garbage collection service

Conveniently located 2 km from Kandy Municipal limits with access via Polgolla, Madawala, Lewella and Kundasale. Has quick access to the A9 Highway, leading international schools and recreation.
